contentList.content: Dragon-like scales cover parts of your skin. When you aren't wearing armour, your base <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is 13 and you can add your Constitution modifier instead of your Dexterity modifier.
War Sorcery

Bind your magic to a weapon for 1 Sorcery Point to become Proficient with it. The weapon becomes magical and gains a +1 to attack and damage rolls.

At 5th level: You can increase the cost to 3 Sorcery Points to gain the ability to make a melee attack with the bound weapon as a bonus action whenever you cast a spell.

At 10th level: You can increase the cost to 6 Sorcery Points to increase the bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2. After casting a non-cantrip spell, the next melee attack you make with the bound weapon before the end of your turn deals additional damage.
War Sorcery: Bind Weapon

Bind to your main hand weapon. Its damage becomes magical and it gains a bonus to attack and damage rolls. You become <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it if you weren't already.
You can only bind 1 weapon per long rest.
War Sorcery: Bound Weapon
The sorcerer bound to this weapon is always <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with it. The weapon's damage is magical and gains a +[1] bonus to attack and damage rolls.
War Sorcery: Extra Attack
After casting a spell, you can make a weapon attack as a bonus action.
War Sorcery: Arcane Feedback
The next attack you make on this turn deals additional damage equal to the level of the last spell you cast.

War Sorcery: Bind Weapon - 3 Sorcery Points
Increase the cost to 3 Sorcery Points to gain the ability to make a melee attack with the bound weapon as a bonus action whenever you cast a spell.

Increase the cost to 6 Sorcery Points to improve the bonus to attack and damage rolls to +2 and to gain additional damage on the next melee attack you make with the bound weapon before the end of your turn after you cast a non-cantrip spell.
